name: Lofi Clicker
description:
Lofi Clicker is a type of clicker game developed in just one week. The goal of the game is to click on the screen in rhythm with the background lofi music, trying to get the highest score possible. 

You can improve your score by purchasing upgrades and  unlock different instruments that change the music in real time  using the points you earn by playing. The game is accompanied by a relaxing lofi soundtrack for a pleasant gaming experience.

Game Submited For the Clicker Jam Winter 2023

The theme was Interdimensional

A Cat In Cup Game

Art : Jeremie (Sicryn)

Prog : Romain

Sound Design and OST : David (Delta Element)
